casebody.data:
Tammy MCNEILL-MARKS, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
MIDMICHIGAN MEDICAL CENTER-GRATIOT, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 154159
COA: 326606 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 24, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's June 15, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED.
